DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether ospemifene effective placebo treatment vulvar vaginal atrophy ( VVA ) postmenopausal woman .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Study Evaluate Ospemifene Treatment Vulvar Vaginal Atrophy Postmenopausal Women
DOC.criteria: Naturally surgically postmenopausal Moderate severe symptom vaginal atrophy ( ie , vaginal dryness , irritation itching , difficult painful urination , pain bleed intercourse ) Vaginal pH great 5.0 5 % few superficial cell maturation index vaginal smear Evidence endometrial hyperplasia , endometrial cancer , abnormal endometrial pathology Abnormal Pap smear Uterine bleed unknown origin uterine polyp Current vaginal infection require medication
